articles.author: Chris Pandolfo, Andrew Murray
articles.title: House Republicans call on Biden not to ban gas stoves: ''Nanny state' at its worst' - Fox Business
articles.description: House Republicans are demanding that the Biden administration cease any effort to ban gas stoves in American homes, after reports floated the idea earlier this week.
articles.content:
Furious lawmakers are calling on President Biden to cease any efforts by his administration to ban natural gas stoves inside Americans' homes. 
Republicans on the House Committee on Energy and Comme… [+5153 chars]

articles.title: Biden files investigation will overshadow White House - BBC
articles.description: The distinctions between the inquiry into Mr Biden and a parallel one into Donald Trump may pass most Americans by.
articles.content:
